description: Information about an image's suitability for use.

___lensDistortionAvailable.description: Indication of whether or not lens aberration correction information is available.

___description.description: A natural language description of the meaning of the identifier value.

___namespace.description: A string which unambiguously defines the namespace for the identifier.

___identifier.description: A name that is used to identify the resource.

___authority.description: Citation for the authority issuing the identifier.

___cameraCalibrationAvailable.description: Indication of whether or not constants are available which allow for camera calibration corrections.

___imagingCondition.description: Code which indicates conditions which may affect the image.

___illuminationAzimuthAngle.description: Illumination azimuth measured in degrees clockwise from true north at the time the image is taken. For images from a scanning device, refer to the centre pixel of the image

___illuminationElevationAngle.description: Illumination elevation measured in degrees clockwise from the target plane at intersection of the optical line of sight with the Earth’s surface. For images from a scanning device, refer to the centre pixel of the image.

___radiometricCalibrationAvailable.description: Indication of whether or not the radiometric calibration information for generating the radiometrically calibrated standard data product is available.

___compressionQuantity.description: Count of the number of lossy compression cycles performed on the image.

___cloudCoverPercent.description: Area of the dataset obscured by clouds, expressed as a percentage of the spatial extent.

___filmDistortionAvailable.description: Indication of whether or not Calibration Reseau information is available

___triangulationIndicator.description: Indication of whether or not triangulation has been performed upon the image.
